cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

project(crcle LANGUAGES C)

set(PROJECT_VERSION 1.0)
set(PROJECT_DESCRIPTION "CRC32/CRC32C/CCITT32/ZIP checksum variants C library")

include(GNUInstallDirs)
include(FindPkgConfig)

set(SOURCE_FILES
	crc.c
)

set(INCLUDE_FILES
	crc.h
)

set(EXAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES
	crcle.c
)

add_library( ${PROJECT_NAME} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${INCLUDE_FILES})
add_executable( chkcrc ${EXAMPLE_SOURCE_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${INCLUDE_FILES})

set(install_prefix "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
set(install_libdir "${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}")
set(install_includedir "${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}")

configure_file(lib${PROJECT_NAME}.pc.in ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib${PROJECT_NAME}.pc @ONLY)

set(ENV{PKG_CONFIG_PATH} "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}:$ENV{PKG_CONFIG_PATH}")

install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME} chkcrc EXPORT ${PROJECT_NAME}Config
	LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}
	ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}
	RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR}
	PUBLIC_HEADER DESTINATION
	${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/lib${PROJECT_NAME}
	)

install(FILES ${INCLUDE_FILES} DESTINATION
	${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/lib${PROJECT_NAME}/)

install(FILES lib${PROJECT_NAME}.pc DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}/pkgconfig/)
